thread.title: Justin Keener and JMJ Financial Announce Record Results for First Half of 2015
thread.title_full: Justin Keener and JMJ Financial Announce Record Results for First Half of 2015

author: PRWEB
title: Justin Keener and JMJ Financial Announce Record Results for First Half of 2015
text:
"Our record results this year are a testament to the benefits our QuickLoan provides to emerging US companies in need of working capital," said Keener. Miami Beach, FL (PRWEB) July 21, 2015
Justin Keener and JMJ Financial today announced record results for the first six months of 2015, with the number of companies added to the portfolio this year far exceeding last year's results.
“It’s an exciting time for our firm,” said Justin Keener, Founder and Portfolio Manager of JMJ Financial. “Our record results this year are a testament to the benefits our QuickLoan provides to emerging US companies in need of working capital. I am proud of our team’s exceptional results and value our relationships with over 200 portfolio companies,” said Keener.
JMJ Financial’s innovative QuickLoan has revolutionized access to unsecured working capital for small, publicly-held companies. The firm invests its own capital, facilitating rapid decisions and removing reliance on outside investors or third parties. With a streamlined funding process and simple documents, JMJ Financial has the flexibility to deploy funds in the range of $50,000 to $250,000 within a matter of a few business days.
As a recognized leader in the space, Keener and JMJ Financial have committed to invest $20,000,000 to this vital sector of the economy during 2015. To accommodate this growth, JMJ Financial is expanding its offices and staff. For more information, please visit our website at http://www.JMJFN.com .
ABOUT JMJ FINANCIAL
Based in Miami, FL, JMJ Financial is a privately held investment firm that specializes in providing growth and development capital to emerging small cap companies. The firm is founded, managed, and funded by industry pioneer Justin Keener. JMJ is not a broker or finder, the firm invests its own capital into transactions designed to build long term working relationships with a focused group of innovative companies. With over 200 Nasdaq, OTC Markets, NYSE, and OTCBB companies in its portfolio and a long and highly successful track record, JMJ Financial is one of the most active and reliable investors in the space. Please visit http://www.JMJFN.com for more information.
